required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Endovascular treatmenT for Acute Ischemic Stroke in China
clinical_study.official_title: Endovascular treatmenT for Acute Ischemic Stroke in China: a Retrospective, National, Multi-center, Registry Study

lead_sponsor.agency: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

clinical_study.source: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

brief_summary.textblock: This is a retrospective real world registry study, aiming to explore the effectiveness and safety of endovascular treatment of acute ischemic stroke in a Chinese population.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score (mRS) 0 to 2
primary_outcome.description: the minimum and maximum values of mRS are 0 and 6, respectively; higher mRS mean a worse outcome

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in National Institute of Health stroke scale (NIHSS)
secondary_outcome.description: the minimum and maximum values of NIHSS are 0 and 42, respectively; higher NIHSS mean a worse outcome

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2
Distribution of modified Rankin Score after treatment
sICH was defined as 4 or more increase in NIHSS caused by hemorrhage

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of intraparenchymal hemorrhage (PH1 and PH2)
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of intraparenchymal hemorrhage (PH1 and PH2) after treatment
edema is determined by middle shift.

intervention.description: all enrolled patients must receive endovascular treatment.

study_pop.textblock: all patients must receive endovascular treatment regardless of the time from onset to treatment.

facility.name: Department of Neurology, General Hospital of Northern Theater Command

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region
